Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Observation
b) Defect Observed: Lightning strike damage assessment. Abnormality observed during system test.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Electromagnetic interference affecting sensor accuracy
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Wing Structure component. Physical
examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.
c) Remedial Measures Clean and re-lubricate affected assemblies per technical manual
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Establish periodic calibration schedule
d) Attributable Code: N - Not established
Remarks: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Detailed analysis indicates design margins are adequate. Failure attributed to operational factors. Concur with findings.
Date: 30/06/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Dr. A.K. Sharma
